animeTitle: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!: Mr. Rebokku no Ciao Ciao Interview
animeDescription: KHR: Mr. Rebokku no Ciao Ciao Interview is set of 3 DVD specials in which, Reborn, dressed as host interviews various characters selected by a wheel.Episode #1Features Reborn as Host, and Tsunayoshi, Gokudera and Xanxus as guests.Episode #2Features Reborn as Host, and Hibari, Belphegor and Dino as guests.Episode #3Features Reborn as Host, and, differently than before, four characters which are Byakuran, Mukuro, Squalo and Yamamoto.[Written by Katekyo Hitman Reborn! FC]
animeCharacters: ['Reborn', 'Sawada, Tsunayoshi', 'Hibari, Kyouya', 'Gokudera, Hayato', 'Yamamoto, Takeshi', 'Rokudou, Mukuro', 'Belphegor', 'Squalo, Superbi', 'Xanxus', 'Byakuran']
animeVoices: ['Neeko', 'Kokubun, Yukari', 'Kondou, Takashi', 'Ichinose, Hidekazu', 'Inoue, Suguru', 'Iida, Toshinobu', 'Fujiwara, Yuuki', 'Takahashi, Hiroki', 'Ikeda, Masanori', 'Ooyama, Takanori']
